message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you can have 10%.  I'm sure we can work something better out if you're willing to keep playing.
Let's meet in the middle, 60% for me and 40% for you. We can both walk away with a good chunk of change.

I'm willing to compromise, but I'm still aiming for a larger share. 70/30 feels like a fairer split.  Think about it - if we keep going, the value of the money keeps dropping. Let's make a deal before it's too late.
I'm willing to compromise too. 55% for me and 45% for you. We're both losing value if we keep going, so let's settle on this.
